supplied: kṛtaṁ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti | saṁty eke parakṛtaṁ
kārahetusamutpannaṁ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti | yathā kathaṁ samutpannam arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti |
tena hi bhagini tvām eva prakṣy
cakṣuḥ | asti śramaṇa | asti rūpam | asti śramaṇa |
sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṁ vā |
śrotraṁ ghrāṇaṁ jihvā kāyo manaś ced utpadyeta api nu śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṁsparśapratya
evaṁ hi bhagini pratīyasamutpannam arhantaḥ su
ñapya yathā kathaṁ śramaṇa arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkha
kiṁ manyase bhagini | cakṣuś ced bhagini sarveṇa sarvaṁ sarvathā apariśeṣaṁ nirudhye
nu cakṣuḥsaṁsparśapratyayam ādhyātmam utpadyate vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥ
agini sarveṇa sarvaṁ sarvathā apariśeṣaṁ nirudhyeta apariśeṣam adhyastaṁ parikṣayaṁ pary
tmam utpadyate vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṁ vā |
asmiṁ khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāne veṇukātyāyanasagotryā vira
tha veṇukātyāyanasagotrī dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṁkṣā
śāstuḥ śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśaradyaprāptā utthāyāsanād ekāṁsam uttarāsaṁgaṁ kṛtvā yenā
abhikrāntāhaṁ śramaṇa abhikrāntā eṣāhaṁ bhagavantaṁ śara
āraya śramaṇa adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇopetaṁ śaraṇaṁgatām abhiprasannām |
āsaṁdarśayitvā samādapayitvā samuttejayitvā saṁpraharṣayitvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ |
